name: Box Killer - Christmas Shooter
description:
Aim and Shoot! Destroy angry boxes and enjoy perfect Christmas music and snow location. Leave no the boxes chances in this action oriented first person shooter game! Box Killer is the #1 realistic 3D FPS game available on Google Play. Offline shooting game, small size and exciting gameplay. 

 Be a warrior and join the survival game, feel the adrenaline in this insane mode, the endless game. Jump and shoot in this offline game. Run away, shoot, try to escape and survive.

Be a hero in this offline shooter, join the game to escape from hundreds of enemies, who like a zombie.
